name: The Lost Forest (elifyener)
description:
The Lost Forest

The Lost Forest is an open source 2D platform game developed with Unity2D. 

Get Source Code

The aim of our character is to reach the end of the game by collecting the carrots in the chests. It offers a traditional platform game playing experience where we can earn points by collecting stars and neutralizing enemies.

Note: Unity2D version is 2020.3.3f1

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Movement: WASD, Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space, Up Arrow
  • Esc: Pause Screen
Credits
  • Graphics: Sunny Land Forest, Free Pixel Art Hill
  • Sounds: Michael-DB, Mickleness, CrystalMeshDavid
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Thanks to all of the game development community for their awesome help.
